newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: BTA up 4.4 pct on hopes of higher dividend.
newsitem.headline: BTA up 4.4 pct on hopes of higher dividend.

text.p: Shares in Banco Totta & Acores (BTA) rose 105 escudos, or 4.4 percent, to 2,490 escudos on expectations that the bank would pay out a higher dividend than it originally announced.
Dealers said that the market expected BTA to announce a higher dividend at its shareholder assembly today. The bank initially said it would pay out 135 escudos per share.
"People are talking about at least 145 escudos per share," said one trader.
BTA paid a gross dividend of 190 escudos on its 1995 results.
By 1140 GMT 52,200 BTA shares had been traded.
